name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.input.record
script:
start:
  await:
    form:
      elements:
        text/prompt_key:
          label: Key:
          type: uri
          required@bool: yes
  
        sheet/prompt_record_type:
          label: Record Type:
          required@bool: yes
          data:
            automation:
              uri: cerb:automation:cerb.data.record.types
              inputs:
          limit: 10
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
              paging@bool: yes
              filtering@bool: yes
            columns:
              selection/uri:
                params:
                  mode: single
              text/label_singular:
                params:
                  bold@bool: yes
  
        sheet/prompt_required:
          label: Required:
          required@bool: yes
          data@json:
            [
              { "name": "yes" },
              { "name": "no" }
            ]
          limit: 10
          default: yes
          schema:
            layout:
              headings@bool: no
            columns:
              selection/_selection:
                params:
                  mode: single
                  value_key: name
              text/name:

  return:
    snippet@text:
      record/{{prompt_key|lower}}:
        record_type: {{prompt_record_type}}
        required@bool: {{prompt_required}}
